POLYTECHNIC/COURSE  COURSE REQUIREMENTS  UTME SUBJECTS  REMARKS/WAIVER  
FEDPO-OKO   
IBD-POLY  
IMT-ENU  
KAN-POLY   
KOGI-POLY   
LASPOTECH   
MAPOLY  
OGWASHIUKU  
OSUNPOLY  
RUGIPO  
TIPE  
  
  
ARTS AND INDUSTRIAL DESIGN  
AUCHIPOLY  
YABATECH   
  
  
Religious Knowledge,  
Economics/Commerce  
Geography, Home Economics  
  
 d) KOGI-POLY offers it as Arts and Industrial Design.  
e) LASPOTEC requires ‘O’ level credit pass in Art 
and English Language.  
f) FEDPO-NEK requires ‘O’ level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics and any three (3) from 
History/Government, Literature in English, Clothing  
and Textiles, Chemistry/Physics,  
Economics/Commerce, Technical Drawing, Fine Arts.  
g) RUGIPO requires five (5) O’ level credit passes to 
include English Language, Fine Art/Visual 
Art/Technical Drawing and any three (3) of History, 
Chemistry/Physics, Biolog y/Agricultural Science, 
Literature in English, Mathematics, Religious Studies, 
Clothing & Textile, Economics, Geography, Commerce 
and Government.  
h) MAPOLY accepts five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at not 
more than two (2) sittings or four (4) ‘o’ level credi t 
passes at one (1) sitting ‘O’ level pass in English 
Language.  
i) AUCHI POLY requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit 
passes in English Language, Mathematics, and 
any other three subjects at a sitting. Six (6) credit 
passes including English Language and 
Mathematics at two (2) sittings as course 
requirements.  
j) YABATECH requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit 
passes in English Language, Visual/Fine Art and 
any three (3) from History,  
Chemistry/Physics/Biology/Agricultural Science, 
Geography, Economics, Government, Commerce, 
Literature in English, CRS/Islamic Studies, 
Mathematics, Clothing & Textile.  
k) OSUNPOLY in addition to the course requirement 
accepts Dyeing and Bleaching, Civic  
Education/Government/History/Marketing/  
Commerce, Animal Husbandry/Fisheries, Gener al 
Metal Works, General Wood Work, Painting and  
Decoration, Craft Practice, Data Processing/ 
Computer Studies/ICT, Photography, Clothing 
and Textiles.
